src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ na hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattvabhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpannacitteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣitasmṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu  nādhyāśayavipannacalācalabuddhisarvabhājanena śakyaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra bodhisattvādhyāśayaratnabhājanena /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，非下劣眾生慳、嫉、破戒、懈怠、妄念、無智器中所能容持，亦非退失殊勝志願、散亂、惡覺眾生器中所能容持，唯除菩薩深心寶器。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvaratnāni nirvidhyāti,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，能穿眾寶。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ sarvadharmaratnāni nirvidhyati /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，悉能穿徹一切法寶。 「善男子！

src_original: tadyathā vajraṃ sarvaśailāni bhinatti,
tgt_original: 譬如金剛，能壞眾山。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ sarvadṛṣṭigataśailāni bhinatti /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，悉能摧壞諸邪見山。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaratnaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，雖破不全，一切眾寶猶不能及。

src_original: evameva āśayavipattibhinnamapi sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇālaṃkārānabhibhavati /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，雖復志劣，少有虧損，猶勝一切二乘功德。

src_original: (Gv 406) tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvadāridryaṃ vinivartayati,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，雖有損缺，猶能除滅一切貧窮。

src_original: evameva pratibhinnamapi sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvasaṃsāradāridryaṃ vinivartayati /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，雖有損缺，不進諸行，猶能捨離一切生死。

src_original: evameva kiyatparīttārambaṇaprasṛto 'pi sarvajñatācittotpādavajradhātuḥ sarvājñānabhedalakṣaṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 如小金剛，悉能破壞一切諸物。 菩提心金剛亦復如是，入少境界，即破一切無知諸惑。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraratnaṃ na prākṛtajanahastagataṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，非凡人所得。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ  na prākṛtādhyāśayānāmitvarakuśalamūlānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ hastagataṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，非劣意眾生之所能得。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra ratnaparīkṣānabhijñaḥ puruṣo vajramaṇiratnaguṇānajānan nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，不識寶人不知其能、不得其用。

src_original: evameva duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣapudgalo bodhisattvacittamahāprajñāvajraratnaguṇānabhijño nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，不知法人不了其能、不得其用。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，無能銷滅。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatāhetubhūtaṃ bodhicittotpādavajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，一切諸法無能銷滅。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ mahāpraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ mahānagnenāpi saṃdhārayitumanyatra mahānārāyaṇasthāmabalavegena,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 如金剛杵，諸大力人皆不能持，唯除有大那羅延力。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādamahāvajrapraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhamahānagnairapi
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，一切二乘皆不能持，唯除菩薩廣大因緣堅固善力。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra yatra sarvapraharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajraṃ prasahate,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，一切諸物無能壞者，而能普壞一切諸物，然其體性無所損減。

src_original: evameva yatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapraṇidhijñānapraharaṇāni na prasahante sattvaparipākavinaye vā tryadhvakalpacaryāduḥkhasaṃvāse vā,  tatra sarvajñatācittotpādamahāvajrapraharaṇagṛhīto bodhisattvo 'parikhinnamānasaḥ prasahate,  na pratihanyate /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，普於三世無數劫中，教化眾生，修行苦行，聲聞、緣覺所不能者咸能作之，然其畢竟無有疲厭亦無損壞。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ kenacitpṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitumanyatra vajratalena,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，餘不能持，唯金剛地之所能持。

src_original: evameva sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairbodhisattvaniryāṇapraṇidhānasaṃbhāravajraṃ na śakyaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatrādhyāśayabodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhapṛthivītalena
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，聲聞、緣覺皆不能持，唯除趣向薩婆若者。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra dṛḍhavajratalācchidrabhājanatvānmahāsamudre pānīyaṃ na visarati,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 如金剛器，無有瑕缺用盛於水，永不滲漏而入於地。

src_original: evameva bodhisattvavajrācchidradṛḍhatalapariṇāmanāpratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante sarvabhavopapattiṣu /
tgt_original: 菩提心金剛器亦復如是，盛善根水，永不滲漏，令入諸趣。 「善男子！

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajratalapratiṣṭhitā mahāpṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati,
tgt_original: 如金剛際，能持大地，不令墜沒。

src_original: evameva bodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni sarvatraidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，能持菩薩一切行願，不令墜沒入於三界。 「善男子！

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajramudakena na klidyate,
tgt_original: 譬如金剛，久處水中，不爛不濕。

src_original: evameva bodhicittotpādavajraṃ sarvakarmakleśodakena sarvakarmasaṃvāsairna klidyate na svidyate /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，於一切劫，處在生死業惑水中，無壞無變。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvāgnidāhairna dahyate na saṃtapyate,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 譬如金剛，一切諸火不能燒然、不能令熱。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ sarvasaṃsāraduḥkhāgnidāhairna dahyate,  sarvakleśāgnitāpairna saṃtapyate /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，一切生死諸煩惱火不能燒然、不能令熱。 「善男子！

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhimaṇḍe  niṣīdatāṃ māraṃ yodhayatāṃ sarvajñatābhisaṃbuddhamānānāṃ nānyena pṛthivīpradeśena śakyamāsanaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra trisāhasramahāsāhasravajranābhidharaṇitalena,
tgt_original: 譬如三千世界之中金剛座上，能持諸佛坐於道場、降伏諸魔、成等正覺，非是餘座之所能持。

src_original: evameva bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatāṃ caryāṃ caratāṃ pāramitāḥ  paripūrayatāṃ kṣāntimavakrāmatāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhamānānāṃ kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayatāṃ  vyākaraṇaṃ saṃpratīcchatāṃ sarvabodhisattvamārgasaṃbhāramupastambhayatāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ
tgt_original: 菩提心座亦復如是，能持菩薩一切願行、諸波羅蜜、諸忍、諸地、迴向、受記、修集菩提助道之法、供養諸佛、聞法受行，一切餘心所不能持。

src_original: iti hi (Gv 407) kulaputra ebhiśca anyaiśca apramāṇairyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩提心者，成就如是無量無邊乃至不可說不可說殊勝功德。

src_original: te 'pi sattvā evaṃguṇadharmasamanvāgatā bhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti ca,  yairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni /
tgt_original: 若有眾生發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，則獲如是勝功德法。

src_original: tasmāttarhi kulaputra sulabdhāste lābhāḥ,
tgt_original: 是故，善男子！ 汝獲善利！

src_original: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parimārgasi eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ pratilābhāya //
tgt_original: 汝發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，求菩薩行，已得如是大功德故。

src_original: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyā antikādapakramya  yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya etamevāprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanaṃ
tgt_original: 爾時，善財童子向迦毘羅城，思惟修習受生解脫，增長廣大，憶念不捨。

src_original: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhāvayan avataran vipulīkurvan anutiṣṭhan uttāpayan parijayan  paricintayan pravicinvan anupūrveṇa yena dharmadhātupratibhāsaprabho bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādastenopasaṃkrāmat /
tgt_original: 漸次遊行，至菩薩集會普現法界光明講堂，其中有神，號：

src_original: tasyopasaṃkramaṇasya aśokaśrīrnāma bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā daśabhirgṛhadevatāsahasraiḥ  sārdhaṃ pratyudgamya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - svāgataṃ te mahāpuruṣa mahāprajñājñānavikrāmin
tgt_original: 無憂德，與一萬主宮殿神俱，來迎善財，作如是言： 「善來丈夫！

src_original: acintyabodhisattvavimokṣabhāvanādhyālambanapraṇidhicittavipuladharmavimānagocaracārin  dharmanagarābhimukha anantabodhisattvopāyanayāvatāraṇāpratiprasrabdhatathāgataguṇasāgarāvabhāsapratilabdha
tgt_original: 有大智慧，有大勇猛，能修菩薩不可思議自在解脫，心恒不捨廣大誓願，善能觀察諸法境界； 安住法城，入於無量諸方便門，成就如來功德大海；

src_original: sarvajagadvinayapratibhāsapratibhānajñānābhimukhasarvasattvacaryājñānakāyamantrānuvartana  caryābhimukhacitta sarvajagadvedanāprītisamudravegavivardhanapraṇidhāna sarvatathāgatadharmaprativedhamārgapratipanna /
tgt_original: 得妙辯才，善調眾生，獲聖智身，恒順修行，知諸眾生心行差別，令其歡喜趣向佛道。

src_original: yathā tvāṃ paśyāmi animiṣanetragambhīracaryeryāpathaviśuddhagocaram,  nacireṇa tvamanuttaratathāgatakāyavākcittālaṃkāraviśuddhiṃ pratilabdho lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapratimaṇḍitena kāyena daśabalajñānālokālaṃkṛtena cittena lokaṃ vicariṣyasi /
tgt_original: 「我觀仁者修諸妙行心無暫懈，威儀所行悉皆清淨，汝當不久得諸如來清淨莊嚴無上三業，以諸相好莊嚴其身，以十力智瑩飾其心，遊諸世間。

src_original: yādṛśīṃ ca te dṛḍhavīryaparākramatāṃ paśyāmi,  nacireṇa tvaṃ sarvatryadhvatathāgatasaṃmukhībhāvadarśanasamaṅgī sarvatathāgatadharmameghān  saṃpratīcchan sarvabodhisattvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiśāntadharmavimānaratimanubhavan
tgt_original: 我觀仁者勇猛精進而無有比，不久當得普見三世一切諸佛聽受其法，不久當得一切菩薩禪定解脫諸三昧樂，不久當入諸佛如來甚深解脫。

src_original: tathā hi tvaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇadarśanaparyupāsanānuśāsanīḥ saṃpratīcchaṃstadguṇapratinayeṣu prayujyamāno na parikhidyase,  na vinivartase,  na paritapasi /  na ca te kaścidantarāyo vā āvaraṇaṃ vā nivaraṇaṃ vā prasahate,  mārā vā mārakāyikā vā devatāḥ /  tena acirādeva tvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prītikaro bhaviṣyasi //
tgt_original: 見善知識親近供養，聽受其教，憶念修行，不懈不退，無憂無悔，無有障礙，魔及魔民不能為難，不久當成無上果故。

src_original: nandīdhvajo 'bhūtpravaraḥ purāṇāṃ śreṣṭhī tadānīṃ suvighuṣṭakīrtiḥ /
tgt_original: 城中有居士，　　號曰善名稱；

src_original: tasyāhamāsaṃ duhitā manāpā bhānuprabhā nāma sucārurūpā // 101 //
tgt_original: 我時為彼女，　　名為淨日光。

src_original: prāsādiko lakṣaṇacitritāṅgaḥ tatrābhavanme sumahān prasādaḥ // 102 //
tgt_original: 諸相極端嚴，　　其心生染著。

src_original: evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'śokaśriyaṃ bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatāmetadavocat - tathāstu devate yathā vadasi /
tgt_original: 」善財童子言： 「聖者！ 如向所說，願我皆得。 聖者！

src_original: ahaṃ khalu devate sarvasattvakleśasaṃtāpavyupaśamena paramāṃ prītiṃ vindāmi /  sarvasattvaviṣayakarmavipākavinivartanena sarvasattvasukhasaṃbhavena sarvasattvānavadyakarmapratipattyā paramāṃ prītiṃ vindāmi /
tgt_original: 我願一切眾生，息諸熱惱，離諸惡業，生諸安樂，修諸淨行。

src_original: yadā ca devate sattvā vividhaviṣayakarmakleśaprayogākṣiptacittā durgatiṣu prapatanti sugatiṣu vā,  vividhāni kāyikacaitasikāni duḥkhadaurmanasyāni pratyanubhavanti,  durmanasastasmin samaye bodhisattvā bhavanti paramadurmanasaḥ /
tgt_original: 聖者！ 一切眾生，起諸煩惱，造諸惡業，墮諸惡趣，若身若心恒受楚毒，菩薩見已心生憂惱。 聖者！

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma devate puruṣasyaikāntatṛṣṇācaritasya ekaputrako bhavet priyo manāpaḥ /  sa tasyāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu cchidyamāneṣu ekāntatṛṣṇācaritatvāt paramadurmanāḥ syādanāttamanaskaḥ,
tgt_original: 譬如有人，唯有一子，愛念情至，忽見被人割截肢體，其心痛切不能自安。

src_original: yadā gṛhadvāragato mamābhūt pātre pradatto 'sya maṇistadā me /
tgt_original: 次乞至我門，　　我心增愛染， 即解身瓔珞，　　并珠置鉢中。

src_original: evameva devate bodhisattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sattvān karmakleśavaśena tisṛṣu durgatiṣu patitān dṛṣṭvā durmanā bhavati paramadurmanāḥ
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，見諸眾生以煩惱業墮三惡趣受種種苦，心大憂惱。

src_original: muktvā ca sarvābharaṇāni maitracittānunītāhamadāttadāsmai // 103 //  sarāgacittena vidhāya pūjāṃ suraśmiketoḥ sugatātmajasya /
tgt_original: 雖以愛染心，　　供養彼佛子；

src_original: ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni nāgāṃ kalpottamāyāṃ khalu jātvapāyān // 104 //
tgt_original: 二百五十劫，　　不墮三惡趣。

src_original: deveṣu devendrakuleṣu jātā narendraputrī manujeṣu cāham /
tgt_original: 或生天王家，　　或作人王女，

src_original: ardhatṛtīyeṣu gateṣu kalpaśateṣu jātāsmyabhayaṃkarāṇām /
tgt_original: 生於善現家，　　名為具妙德。

src_original: dṛṣṭvātha tejodhipatiṃ kumāraṃ pūjāmakārṣaṃ muditāhamasya /
tgt_original: 時我見太子，　　而生尊重心，

src_original: ātmānamasyaiva nivedayitvā bhūtāsmi vaśyā khalu tasya bhāryā // 107 //
tgt_original: 願得備瞻侍，　　幸蒙哀納受。

src_original: saṃpūjitastena mayā sahābhūt sa sūryagātrapravaro maharṣiḥ /  prasannayā caiva tamīkṣya buddhamutpāditaṃ me varabodhicittam // 108 //
tgt_original: 我時與太子，　　覲佛勝日身， 恭敬供養畢，　　即發菩提意。

src_original: pūrṇā jinānāṃ khalu ṣaṣṭikoṭyastatraiva kalpe susamutthitānām /
tgt_original: 於彼一劫中，　　六十億如來，

src_original: babhūva teṣāṃ caramo jinānāṃ buddhastadānīmadhimuktitejāḥ // 109 //
tgt_original: 最後佛世尊，　　名為廣大解。

src_original: tasmin viśuddhaṃ mama dharmacakṣurdharmasvabhāvaśca mayāvabuddhaḥ /  ayoniśo 'tyantavikalpa śāntā labdhāvabhāsāsmyabhavaṃ tato 'rvāk // 110 //
tgt_original: 於彼得淨眼，　　了知諸法相， 普見受生處，　　永除顛倒心。

src_original: samādhibhūmiṃ ca vilokayāmi tataḥprabhṛtyeva jinaurasānām /
tgt_original: 我得觀菩薩，　　三昧境解脫，

src_original: kṣetrārṇavānekamanaḥkṣaṇena cintāvyatītāṃśca diśāmi dikṣu // 111 //
tgt_original: 一念入十方，　　不思議剎海。

src_original: nānāviśuddhāni ca sarvadikṣu kṣetrāṇi paśyāmyamitādbhutāni /
tgt_original: 我見諸世界，　　淨穢種種別，

tgt_original: 爾時，善財童子聞善知識教，潤澤其心，正念思惟諸菩薩行，向海岸國。

src_original: samyakcaryāniḥsamarthapūrvāntakoṭīgatakāyapraṇāmasamanvāhāreṇa kāyabalaṃ dṛḍhīkurvāṇaḥ,  pūrvāntakoṭīgatakāyacittapariśuddhiniṣkāraṇasaṃsārikacittapracārasamanvāhāreṇa cittamanasikāraṃ gṛhṇan,
tgt_original: 自憶往世不修禮敬，即時發意勤力而行； 復憶往世身心不淨，即時發意專自治潔；

src_original: pūrvāntakoṭyasatkarmalaukikakāryaprayuktaḥ niṣprayojanapariṣyandasamanvāhāreṇa pratyutpannaprayojanamahāsāmarthyaṃ vicintayan,
tgt_original: 復憶往世作諸惡業，即時發意專自防斷；

src_original: pūrvāntabhūtaparikalpasamutthitavitathasaṃkalpasaṃdarśitamanasikārasamanvāhāreṇa sarvabodhisattvacaryāsamyaksaṃkalpābhisaṃskārabalaṃ samutthāpayan,

src_original: atītādhvaviparyāsasaṃprayuktamithyāmayayogaprayogasamanvāhāreṇa pratyutpannādhvasamyaksaṃdarśanāviparyāsasaṃprayuktena bodhisattvapraṇidhānena saṃtatiṃ pariśodhayan,

src_original: pūrvāntagatavīryārambhakāryāpariniṣpannasamanvāhāreṇa pratyutpannasarvabuddhadharmasamudāgamapratyupasthānena mahāvīryārambhavikrameṇa kāyacittasaṃpragrahaṃ

tgt_original: 復憶往世受五趣生於自他身皆無利益，即時發意願以其身饒益眾生成就佛法承事一切諸善知識。

src_original: sattvaparipācanabuddhadharmaparigrahaprayuktasya tathāgatadarśanasarvakṣetrānucaraṇasarvadharmabhāṇakopasthānasarvatathāgataśāsanasaṃdhāraṇaprayuktasyasarvadharmaparyeṣṭisahāyabhūtasya  sarvakalyāṇamitradarśanasarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanaprayuktasya bodhisattvapraṇidhānaśarīrasya
tgt_original: 復觀此身是生、老、病、死眾苦之宅，願盡未來劫，修菩薩道教化眾生，見諸如來成就佛法，遊行一切佛剎，承事一切法師，住持一切佛教，尋求一切法侶，見一切善知識，集一切諸佛法，與一切菩薩願智身而作因緣。

src_original: hetupratyayabhūtamavalokya acintyakuśalamūlendriyavegān vivardhayamānaḥ /  evaṃcittaḥ evaṃmanasikāraḥ evaṃyoniśaḥprayuktaḥ sarvabodhisattvaprasādasamāropitayā  śraddhayā sarvabodhisattvāśayasamāropitena premṇā sarvabodhisattvāśayasamāropitena

tgt_original: 諸根清淨，善法增益，起一切菩薩恭敬供養，作一切菩薩曲躬合掌，生一切菩薩普見世間眼，起一切菩薩普念眾生想；

src_original: sarvajagatsaṃjñājagatsamāropitābhiḥ sarvabodhisattvasvarāṅgaviśuddhisamutthitavarṇodāhāravyūhābhinirhāraiḥ,

src_original: pūrvāntapratyutpannakoṭīgatasarvabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaparipūrṇena tathāgatavihārābhimukhībhāvagatena  saṃjñāgatena sarvatrānugatena tathāgatabodhisattvavikurvaṇāsaṃbodhena ekavālapathāvyatiriktena

src_original: sarvabuddhabodhisattvakāyaspharaṇānugatena sarvabodhisattvacakṣuṣpathapariśuddhisamāropitābhijñājñānālokavijñaptibhiḥ,

src_original: sarvadigjālasaṃbhedānugatena manaāyatanena dharmadhātutalabhedaspharaṇena praṇidhyabhinirhārabalena ākāśadhātuparamaparyavasānena sarvatrānugatena tryadhvāsaṃbhinnena (Gv 369)

src_original: mahākūṭāgārasya purastāddvāramūle sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatitaḥ /  sa imamevaṃrūpamabhinirhāraprayogaṃ muhūrtaṃ vicārya adhimuktiśraddhāsamutthitena adhyāśayapraṇidhyabhinirhārabalena apratiprasrabdhamātmānamadhyatiṣṭhat  evaṃ sarvabodhisaṃmukhībhāveṣu sarvakalyāṇamitrabhavaneṣu sarvatathāgatacaityeṣu  sarvatathāgatavigraheṣu sarvabodhisattveṣu sarvabuddhāvāseṣu sarvadharmaratnasthāneṣu  sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāśrayacaityasaṃmukhībhāveṣu sarvāryagaṇadakṣiṇīyagurumātāpitṛparyanteṣu  apratiprasrabdhamātmānamadhyatiṣṭhat sarvajagatkāyasaṃmukhībhāveṣu sarvatrānugatena  jñānaśarīrāsaṃbhedanayapraveśānugatena saṃjñādhiṣṭhānajñānamanasikāreṇa /
tgt_original: 以深信解、大願力故，入遍一切處智慧身平等門，普現其身在於一切如來前、一切菩薩前、一切善知識前、一切如來塔廟前、一切如來形像前、一切諸佛諸菩薩住處前、一切法寶前、一切聲聞辟支佛及其塔廟前、一切聖眾福田前、一切父母尊者前、一切十方眾生前，皆如上說，尊重禮讚，盡未來際無有休息。

src_original: evaṃ pūrvaparikīrtiteṣu sarvārambaṇeṣu sarvadharmadhātuspharaṇaṃ praṇipātamadhyatiṣṭhat /
tgt_original: 等法界，無障礙故； 等實際，遍一切故；

src_original: pratiśrutkāsamahetupratyayasamutthānasamatayā anutpādasamatayā saṃbhavavibhavasamatayā
tgt_original: 猶如響，緣所發故； 無有生，遞興謝故；

src_original: yathāhetusamutthitaṃ phalamadhimucyamāno yathopacayasamutthitāṃ sarvakriyāmadhimucyamānaḥ  śraddhāsamutthitaṃ sarvatathāgatotpādamadhimucyamāno yathādhimuktisamutthitāni  sarvabuddhapūjānirmāṇānyadhimucyamāno gauravasamutthitāni sarvatathāgatanirmāṇānyadhimucyamānaḥ  kuśalamūlopacayasamutthitāṃ sarvabuddhadharmatāmadhimucyamānaḥ prajñopāyasamutthitān  sarvamanomayavyūhopacayānadhimucyamānaḥ praṇidhisamutthitān sarvabuddhadharmānadhimucyamānaḥ  pariṇāmanāsamutthitān sarvabodhisattvacaryāsarvajñatāviṣayadharmadhātuviṭhapanaspharaṇālaṃkāravyūhānadhimucyamānaḥ
tgt_original: 又決定知一切諸報皆從業起，一切諸果皆從因起，一切諸業皆從習起，一切佛興皆從信起，一切化現諸供養事皆悉從於決定解起，一切化佛從敬心起，一切佛法從善根起，一切化身從方便起，一切佛事從大願起，一切菩薩所修諸行從迴向起，一切法界廣大莊嚴從一切智境界而起。

src_original: ucchedasaṃjñāvigatena pariṇāmanājñānena śāśvatasaṃjñāvibhūtena anutpādajñānena hetukriyādṛṣṭivigatena
tgt_original: 離於斷見，知迴向故； 離於常見，知無生故；

src_original: samyakkriyādṛṣṭivigatena samakriyādṛṣṭivigatena samakriyāvatārahetūpacayajñānena,  viparyāsadṛṣṭivigatena aparapratyayajñānena,
tgt_original: 離無因見，知正因故； 離顛倒見，知如實理故； 離自在見，知不由他故； 離自他見，知從緣起故；

src_original: antagrāhadṛṣṭivigatena anantamadhyadharmadhātupraveśajñānena,
tgt_original: 離邊執見，知法界無邊故；

src_original: saṃkrāntidṛṣṭivigatena pratiṣṭhāsamatābhinirvṛttijñānena bhavavibhavadṛṣṭivigatena anutpādanirodhajñānena,
tgt_original: 離往來見，知如影像故； 離有無見，知不生滅故；

src_original: sarvadṛṣṭivigatena śūnyatānutpādajñānena,  anaiśvaryadharmatāpratibaddhena praṇidhyabhinirhārajñānabalena sarvanimittasaṃjñāpanītena  animittakoṭīmukhajñānena bījāṅkuravināśadharmatayā mudrāpratimudrāsamutthānasamadharmatayā
tgt_original: 離一切法見，知空無生故，知不自在故，知願力出生故； 離一切相，見入無相際故。 知一切法如種生芽故，如印生文故。

src_original: pratibimbadarśanasamadharmatayā pratiśrutkāsamarutaghoṣavijñaptidharmatayā svapnasamavicāravijñaptidharmatayā
tgt_original: 知質如像故，知聲如響故，知境如夢故，知業如幻故。

src_original: pratibhāsadarśanasamadharmatayā māyāgatasamakarmasamutthānadharmatayā cittārūpilokotthāpanadharmatayā  yathāpratyayahetūpacayaphaladharmatayā,  yathākarmopacayavipākasamadharmatayā upāyakauśalyaviṭhapanadharmatayā dharmādharmasamatisamatābhiṣyanditadharmatayā /
tgt_original: 了世心現故，了果因起故，了報業集故，了知一切諸功德法皆從菩薩善巧方便所流出故。

src_original: evaṃ jñānapraveśābhinirhṛtena saṃjñāmanasikāreṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako (Gv 370)
tgt_original: 善財童子入如是智，端心潔念；

src_original: kūṭāgāradvāramūlādutthāya muhūrtamanimiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhaṃ  mahākūṭāgāraṃ saṃprekṣya kṛtāñjalipuṭo 'nekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya evaṃsaṃjñāmanasikārasaṃpreṣitacitto
tgt_original: 於樓觀前，舉體投地，慇懃頂禮； 不思議善根流注身心，清涼悅懌。 從地而起，一心瞻仰，目不暫捨，合掌圍遶，經無量匝，作是念言：

src_original: vācamabhāṣata - ayaṃ sa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavihāravihāriṇāmāvāsaḥ /
tgt_original: 「此大樓閣，是解空、無相、無願者之所住處；

src_original: ayaṃ sa sarvadharmāvikalpavihāravihāriṇāmāvāsaḥ /
tgt_original: 是於一切法無分別者之所住處；

src_original: dharmadhātvasaṃbhedavihāravihāriṇāṃ sattvadhāttvanupalambhavihāravihāriṇāṃ
tgt_original: 是了法界無差別者之所住處； 是知一切眾生不可得者之所住處；

src_original: sarvadharmānutpādavihāravihāriṇāṃ sarvalokāniketavihāravihāriṇāṃ sarvajagadālayānilayavihāravihāriṇāṃ  sarvāvasiñcitavihāravihāriṇāṃ sarvāpāśrayāniśritavihāravihāriṇāṃ sarvasamucchrayāniśritavihāravihāriṇāṃ
tgt_original: 是知一切法無生者之所住處； 是不著一切世間者之所住處； 是不著一切窟宅者之所住處；

src_original: sarvakleśasaṃjñāgatavidhūtavihāravihāriṇāṃ sarvadharmāsvabhāvavihāravihāriṇāṃ sarvakalpavikalpāvikalpavihāravihāriṇāṃ
tgt_original: 是不樂一切聚落者之所住處； 是不依一切境界者之所住處； 是離一切想者之所住處； 是知一切法無自性者之所住處； 是斷一切分別業者之所住處； 是離一切想心、意、識者之所住處；

src_original: sarvasaṃjñācittamanoviviktavihāravihāriṇāṃ sarvasaṃjñānāyūhaniryūhavihāravihāriṇāṃ
tgt_original: 是不入不出一切道者之所住處； 是入一切甚深般若波羅蜜者之所住處； 是能以方便住普門法界者之所住處； 是息滅一切煩惱火者之所住處； 是以增上慧除斷一切見、愛、慢者之所住處；

src_original: sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñāvidyotpādavikrīḍitavihāravihāriṇāṃ sarvabodhisattvasamādhigocarabhāvanāvihāravihāriṇāmayaṃ
tgt_original: 是出生一切諸禪解脫三昧通明而遊戲者之所住處； 是觀察一切菩薩三昧境界者之所住處；

src_original: sarvabuddhapādamūlopaniśritavihāravihāriṇāmāvāsaḥ /
tgt_original: 是安住一切如來所者之所住處；

src_original: ye te ekakalpasarvakalpasarvakalpaikakalpānupraveśavihāravihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是以一劫入一切劫，以一切劫入一劫，而不壞其相者之所住處；

src_original: ye te ekadharmasarvadharmasarvadharmaikadharmāvirodhavihāravihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是以一法入一切法，以一切法入一法，而不壞其相者之所住處；

src_original: ye te ekasattvasarvasattvaikasattvānānātvavihāravihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是以一眾生入一切眾生，以一切眾生入一眾生，而不壞其相者之所住處；

src_original: ye te ekabuddhasarvabuddhasarvabuddhaikabuddhādvayavihāravihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是以一佛入一切佛，以一切佛入一佛，而不壞其相者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvārthaikakṣaṇapraveśavihāravihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是於一念中而知一切三世者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvakṣetraikacittotpādagamanavihāravihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是於一念中往詣一切國土者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvasattvabhavanapratibhāsavihāravihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是於一切眾生前悉現其身者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvalokahitasukhacittavihāravihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是心常利益一切世間者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvasvādhīnapratilambhavihāravihāriṇaḥ,  teṣāmayaṃ vihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 是能遍至一切處者之所住處；

src_original: ye te lokaniketoccalitāśca sarvajagadbhavaneṣu saṃdṛśyante sarvasattvaparipācanāya  na ca sthānādvicaranti /
tgt_original: 是雖已出一切世間，為化眾生故而恒於中現身者之所住處； 是不著一切剎，為供養諸佛故而遊一切剎者之所住處； 是不動本處，能普詣一切佛剎而莊嚴者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvatathāgatapādamūlagatāśca buddhasaṃjñābhiniveśavigatāśca /
tgt_original: 是親近一切佛而不起佛想者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvakalyāṇamitropaniśrayavihāravihāriṇaśca,  na caiṣāṃ sarvajagati samasamo 'sti jñānena /
tgt_original: 是依止一切善知識而不起善知識想者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvamārabhavanavihāravihāriṇaśca kāmaguṇarativiprayuktāśca /
tgt_original: 是住一切魔宮而不耽著欲境界者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvasaṃjñāgatapraveśavihāravihāriṇaśca sarvasaṃjñāgatavidhūtamānasāśca /
tgt_original: 是永離一切心想者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvajagaccharīrānugatakāyāśca na cātmasattvadvayavihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是雖於一切眾生中而現其身，然於自他不生二想者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvalokadhātvantargatakāyā na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedavihāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 是能普入一切世界而於法界無差別想者之所住處；

src_original: ye te sarvānāgatakalpasaṃvāsapraṇidhānāśca,  na ca dīrghahrasvakalpasaṃjñāgatavihāravihāriṇaḥ /

src_original: ye te śūnyatāvihāravihāriṇaśca,  na ca dṛṣṭigatasaṃniśritāḥ /  ye te ānimittagocarāśca nimittacaritasattvanayābhimuktāśca /  ye te sarvapraṇidhānavigatāśca bodhisattvapraṇidhānavyavacchinnāśca /  ye te sarvakarmakleśavaśavartinaśca,

src_original: ye te maitrīvihāriṇaśca,  na kvacidanunayavihāriṇaḥ /  ye te karuṇāvihāriṇaśca,  na kvacidanusaṃśayadarśanavihāriṇaḥ /  ye te muditāvihāriṇaśca nityodvignāśca duḥkhitasarvavyavalokanatayā /

tgt_original: 于時，上首諸大聲聞——舍利弗、大目揵連、摩訶迦葉、離婆多、須菩提、阿㝹樓馱、難陀、劫賓那、迦旃延、富樓那等諸大聲聞，在逝多林皆悉不見如來神力、如來嚴好、如來境界、如來遊戲、如來神變、如來尊勝、如來妙行、如來威德、如來住持、如來淨剎，亦復不見不可思議菩薩境界、菩薩大會、菩薩普入、菩薩普至、菩薩普詣、菩薩神變、菩薩遊戲、菩薩眷屬、菩薩方所、菩薩莊嚴師子座、菩薩宮殿、菩薩住處、菩薩所入三昧自在、菩薩觀察、菩薩頻申、菩薩勇猛、菩薩供養、菩薩受記、菩薩成熟、菩薩勇健、菩薩法身清淨、菩薩智身圓滿、菩薩願身示現、菩薩色身成就、菩薩諸相具足清淨、菩薩常光眾色莊嚴、菩薩放大光網、菩薩起變化雲、菩薩身遍十方、菩薩諸行圓滿。

tgt_original: 以善根不同故，本不修習見佛自在善根故，本不讚說十方世界一切佛剎清淨功德故，本不稱歎諸佛世尊種種神變故，本不於生死流轉之中發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心故，本不令他住菩提心故，本不能令如來種性不斷絕故，本不攝受諸眾生故，本不勸他修習菩薩波羅蜜故，本在生死流轉之時不勸眾生求於最勝大智眼故，本不修習生一切智諸善根故，本不成就如來出世諸善根故，本不得嚴淨佛剎神通智故，本不得諸菩薩眼所知境故，本不求超出世間不共菩提諸善根故，本不發一切菩薩諸大願故，本不從如來加被之所生故，本不知諸法如幻、菩薩如夢故，本不得諸大菩薩廣大歡喜故。

src_original: upapādukā nirmalapadmagarbhe sarvāṅgapūrṇā suviśālanetrā // 24 //
tgt_original: 其目淨修廣，　　肢節悉具足。

tgt_original: 於其身中，顯現十方各十佛剎微塵數佛，及佛國土、眾會、道場、種種光明、諸莊嚴事，亦現彼佛往昔所行神通變化、一切大願、助道之法、諸出離行、清淨莊嚴，亦見諸佛成等正覺、轉妙法輪、教化眾生。

tgt_original: 彼諸如來於種種眾會、種種世間、種種趣生、種種家族、種種欲樂、種種業行、種種語言、種種根性、種種煩惱隨眠習氣諸眾生中，或處微細道場，或處廣大道場，或處一由旬量道場，或處十由旬量道場，或處不可說不可說佛剎微塵數由旬量道場，以種種神通、種種言辭、種種音聲、種種法門、種種總持門、種種辯才門，以種種聖諦海、種種無畏大師子吼，說諸眾生種種善根、種種憶念，授種種菩薩記，說種種諸佛法。

src_original: tāṃ ca acintyāṃ bodhisattvasamādhivṛṣabhitām //  atha khalu muktakaḥ śreṣṭhī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstasmātsamādhervyūtthāya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgavyūhaṃ nāma tathāgatavimokṣamāyūhāmi niryūhāmi /

src_original: tasya me kulaputra asaṅgavyūhaṃ tathāgatavimokṣamāyūhato niryūhataḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 我已入出如來無礙莊嚴解脫門。

src_original: sārdhaṃ vairocanagarbhabodhisattvapramukhena sarvabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalena cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchati /  dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi sarvabalavegavatyāṃ lokadhātau samantagandhavitāno nāma tathāgato  'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ cintārājabodhisattvapramukhena sarvabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalena cakṣuṣa (Gv 66)  ābhāsamāgacchati /
tgt_original: 我入出此解脫門時，即見東方閻浮檀金光明世界，龍自在王如來、應、正等覺，道場眾會之所圍遶，毘盧遮那藏菩薩而為上首； 又見南方速疾力世界，普香如來、應、正等覺，道場眾會之所圍遶，心王菩薩而為上首；

src_original: paścimāyāṃ diśi sarvagandhaprabhāsavatyāṃ lokadhātau merupradīparājo nāma tathāgato  'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhamasaṅgacittabodhisattvapramukhena sarvabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalena  cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchati /
tgt_original: 又見西方香光世界，須彌燈王如來、應、正等覺，道場眾會之所圍遶，無礙心菩薩而為上首；
